short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help vegetarians and vegans identify and avoid unsuitable food items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Veggy Help is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to help vegetarians navigate the web with ease and confidence. Whether you're searching for recipes, browsing restaurant menus, or shopping for groceries online, Veggy Help ensures that you can quickly identify and avoid food items that don't align with your vegetarian preferences.

Simply choose your vegetarian type from our comprehensive list of options, including vegan, lacto-ovo vegetarian, lacto vegetarian, and ovo vegetarian. The extension then intelligently scans and processes the text on web pages you visit, highlighting words related to meat, fish, eggs, or dairy based on your preferences. By making these words stand out with eye-catching colors, Veggy Help makes it easy to spot food items that you might want to avoid.
